column1: GFD Seminars
Geophysical and Nonlinear Fluid Dynamics Seminars
Seminars are on Tuesdays at 4.30pm in the Dobson room, AOPP, unless stated otherwise.
Convenors: Dr Irene Moroz, Dr John Norbury, Prof. Peter Read (email: p.read1@physics.ox.ac.uk tel: (01865) 272082).
Asterisks mark seminars which also form part of the <a href="http://www.maths.ox.ac.uk/">
